review: This was a birthday gift for my wife and she loves it. When Momma's happy everybody's happy!
author: billy g martin

review: Enjoy all of the options available. Easy to use.
author: Savena

review: This is the best invention!  It  took seconds to install and I am watching  everything I was watching on my kindle now on big screen
author: jasa68

review: Worked great for a day. Then it wouldn't stream without stuttering, or I'd get sound and no picture, etc. Read the one-star reviews, pretty much the same story here. Tried resetting, de-registering, etc. Junk.
author: Biff Malibu "biffmalibu"

review: I love it, now you can't get me alway from the TV, thank you
author: Bobby D Robertson

review: Excellent product! I loved it so much I bought a second one for another TV in my home.
author: M. Dickson

review: This was a very easy process to get Prime shows on to the TV without fuss- It came ready to go and I literally had it going in 5 minutes with the only issue being not quite enough room on the powerstrip for the plug- We've had no quality issues, no angry re-boots, and the picture quality and selection is completely worth it. I recommend this highly and I don't say that often-
author: Scott W. Northup "Scott N"

review: I love this product! I will be buying another for upstairs use. Not that it's difficult to plug and unplug, it's just that nobody wants to share it!
author: Jean Campbell
